3 from niryo_robot_poses_handlers.file_manager import FileManager
4 
5 from geometry_msgs.msg import TransformStamped
6 
7 
8 class Grip(object):
9  """
10  Represents the robot tool_0 position (the one we plan for) with respect to
11  an object we want to approach.
12 
13  :param name: unique (!) name for the grip that will be used to reference it
14  :param transform: the tf transform msg from object to tool_0
15  """
16  def __init__(self, name, transform):
17  self.name = name
18  self.transform = transform
19 
20  def __str__(self):
21  return "Grip name : {}".format(self.name)
22 
23  def __repr__(self):
24  return self.__str__()
25 
26  def to_dict(self):
27  dict_ = dict()
28  dict_["name"] = self.name
29  transform_dict = dict()
30  transform_dict["header_frame_id"] = self.transform.header.frame_id
31  transform_dict["child_frame_id"] = self.transform.child_frame_id
32  transform_dict["translation"] = [
33  self.transform.transform.translation.x,
34  self.transform.transform.translation.y,
35  self.transform.transform.translation.z
36  ]
37  transform_dict["quaternion"] = [
38  self.transform.transform.rotation.x,
39  self.transform.transform.rotation.y,
40  self.transform.transform.rotation.z,
41  self.transform.transform.rotation.w
42  ]
43  dict_["transform"] = transform_dict
44  return dict_
45 
46  @classmethod
47  def from_dict(cls, dict_):
48  t = TransformStamped()
49  t.transform.translation.x = dict_["transform"]["translation"][0]
50  t.transform.translation.y = dict_["transform"]["translation"][1]
51  t.transform.translation.z = dict_["transform"]["translation"][2]
52 
53  t.transform.rotation.x = dict_["transform"]["quaternion"][0]
54  t.transform.rotation.y = dict_["transform"]["quaternion"][1]
55  t.transform.rotation.z = dict_["transform"]["quaternion"][2]
56  t.transform.rotation.w = dict_["transform"]["quaternion"][3]
57 
58  t.header.frame_id = dict_["transform"]["header_frame_id"]
59  t.child_frame_id = dict_["transform"]["child_frame_id"]
60  return cls(dict_["name"], t)
61 
62 
63 class GripManager(FileManager):
64  """
65  Manages the creation, storage and loading of grips.
66 
67  :raises NiryoRobotFileException:
68  """
69  object_type = Grip
70 
71  def __init__(self, grip_dir, protected_grips=None):
72  super(GripManager, self).__init__(grip_dir, "grip", protected_names=protected_grips)
73 
74  def create(self, grip_name, transform):
75  grip = Grip(grip_name, transform)
76  self._write(grip_name, grip)
